Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 1:00 PM MST Thursday 20 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy

Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 69 %

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries near the Rockies this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 20 April 2023
